Simulating data

Source: vignettes/articles/02-simulate-data.Rmd
02-simulate-data.Rmd

Data poor? Simulate yourself some data, son

If you are eager to get started with verywise but do not have access to a dataset, you can generate both a FreeSurfer nuro-imaging dataset and a phenotype file to go with it. The dataset will be have a verywise structure.

library(verywise)
#> Welcome, verywise user!
#> This is version: 0.1.0
#> For questions, issues, and bug reports, please see https://github.com/SereDef/verywise

All in one go 

# Simulate FreeSurfer and phenotype dataset
simulate_data(subj_dir = "./VeryWiseUserUser/SimulatedExample")

Only brain data

Only generate phenotype file

On this page
